#summary Improve application base in framework.
#labels Lang-En
#sidebar En

For improve existing base of applications _(located in `apps` directory)_ do this:
 * create new empty project _(in directory `/var/www/`)_
 * checkout from SVN project _(use path to this project, for example: `https://phpdays.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/apps/phpdays.org`)_
 * configure project, but no commit configuration files to SVN
